extensionDescription.message: Permet d'entreposer des liens et de les enregistrer dans un fichier

menuAddToDump.description: Add to dump entry in menus.

notificationDownloadComplete.description: Notify the user that the download is complete.

notificationStorageCleared.description: Notify the user that the storage has been cleared.

notificationStorageCopied.description: Notify the user that the storage has been copied to the clipboard.

optionsDefaultFormat.description: Label for the default format option

popupButtonActionClear.description: Label for the clear dump button

popupButtonActionCopy.description: Label for the default copy button

popupButtonActionDownload.description: Label for the default download button

popupContentEmpty.description: Default content when there is no link in the dump.
